subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The Tour de France lost another top rider as Alejandro Valverde of Spain crashed as riders traveled through three countries as part of a stage defined by numerous spills.
snippet: The Tour de France lost another top rider as Alejandro Valverde of Spain crashed as riders traveled through three countries as part of a stage defined by numerous spills.
